comment.author: 74784995@N00
comment._content: French Air Force B-17 in background is, General Koenig's 'Bir Hackeim' , the only B-17 they received which flew via Middle East and India to Indochina ca.September 1945 Also visible a B-24, P-47(razor-back, USAAF)? and B-25

comment.author: 74784995@N00
comment._content: And based on the hangar in one of the other Stirling photos the airfield is Dum Dum Calcutta
